doss.local

Class SqlBlobIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • doss.local.SqlBlobIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlobIndex

    public class SqlBlobIndex
extends Object
implements BlobIndex
    BlobIndex backed by a SQL database using jDBI. This class does not own any jDBI resources and is not responsible for any jDBI resource management.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SqlBlobIndex(org.skife.jdbi.v2.Handle h)
      Connects to the database using a supplied jDBI Handle instance.
      SqlBlobIndex(org.skife.jdbi.v2.IDBI dbi)
      Connects to the database using the supplied DBI instance.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • SqlBlobIndex

        public SqlBlobIndex(org.skife.jdbi.v2.IDBI dbi)
        Connects to the database using the supplied DBI instance. This constructor results in all method calls being committed as soon as possible by jDBI. The jDBI is a bit vague on making a guarantee that the transaction will be committed. This SqlBlobIndex does not make use of any of the access patterns that would cause the transaction to be held open.
        Parameters:
        dbi - The jDBI instance to access the database through

      • SqlBlobIndex

        public SqlBlobIndex(org.skife.jdbi.v2.Handle h)
        Connects to the database using a supplied jDBI Handle instance. This constructor allows transaction management to be done by the owner of the Handle. SqlBlobIndex will not attempt to modify the handle's transaction at all, ie it will not call any methods on org.skife.jdbi.v2.tweak.TransactionHandler
        Parameters:
        h - The connection Handle that will be used to connect to the database.
